claim_summary: Act 58 of 2021 (amending Ark. Code Ann. § 19-5-1144) provides that the Accountability Court Fund shall be used by the Administrative Office of the Courts for adult and juvenile specialty court programs, based on a formula developed by the Arkansas Judicial Council, reviewed by the Specialty Court Program Advisory Committee, and approved by the Legislative Council.

source.title: Act 58 of 2021 — Accountability Court Fund (Ark. Code Ann. § 19-5-1144 amendment)
